title: omg swain is unplayable now
body: after the latest nerfs, riot tossed him back into the realm of never being touched. his healing is now nothing short of useless, and his q does nothing but tickle now. he wasnt op before the nerfs so why they did it is beyond me. riot strikes again

replies.body:
Dumb? A bit.

They shaved off a tiny bit. Don't act like they broke him so hard. He is perfectly fine.
Your post is completely opposite of my post earlier. The Swain my team faced was winning 1 v 4 and 5s....thought our 5th was DC for half the game and behind its still just ridiculous.
